alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 6:19AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze up to a quarter of an inch. A period of rain and freezing rain is expected this morning and travel conditions could become extremely hazardous in shaded or untreated areas. As such, black ice formation is a concern due to cold ground temperatures, even in locations where the air temperature is above freezing. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys, Butte/Blackfoot Region and Potomac/Seeley Lake Region. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Butte, Blackfoot Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
